text: Rupert was a 1991-97 Canadian French and English animated children's television series. It was co-produced by Canadian studio Nelvana and French animation studio Ellipse Programme (Season 1-3) in association with YTV Canada Inc, (Season 1 3 and 5) Playhouse Disney Nickelodeon Nick Jr. Qubo France 3 Toon Disney Television South and Scottish Television (Season 2-5) and with the participation of the Government of Canada Canadian film or video production tax credit program (Season 5) and Center National De Da Cinematographe (Season 1-3) Category:Animated television series Category:1990s Canadian television series Category:1997 Canadian television series endings
title: Rupert (TV series)
